subject: missing order
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,
I ordered two Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors, but only one was delivered.

Order #SSN3807
Best regards

Nico Daucher

conversations.body_text: Hi Neyko Racing,    We have reshipped your order. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2534300708199497

Where is my order? I‘m waiting for 3 weeks! A mounting plate was not included in the first order, so I cannot use it.


Gesendet von Yahoo Mail für iPhone


Am Mittwoch, Dezember 10, 2025, 3:05 AM schrieb service@simsonn.com

Hi Neyko Racing,  I'm sorry for the delayed response. We just returned from vacation and noticed your package has been delivered. Did you not receive it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2534300708199497

Yes but i dont get The mounting plates. I cannot use the item.

Gesendet von Yahoo Mail für iPhone


Am Montag, Januar 5, 2026, 12:18 PM schrieb service@simsonn.com

I didn't receive any mounting plates. I can't use the haptic motors! The service is very poor; first, I only received half the order and had to wait four weeks for the rest, and then the mounting plates were missing.
Gesendet von Yahoo Mail für iPhone


Am Montag, Januar 5, 2026, 12:18 PM schrieb service@simsonn.com
